title: Deep blue sea
creator_credit: Renny Harlin, Alan Richie, Don MacBain, Tony Ludwig, Robert Kosberg, Akiva Goldsman and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer’s disease a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the bait as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back. Cast includes Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, LL Cool J, Jacqueline McKenzie, Michael Rapaport, Stellan Skarsgard, Aida Turturro.
